From: Roberts, Carl 
Sent: Friday, July 5, 2024 9:45 AM
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >

Subject: Loccitane and Salvatore Ferrano BI Claims

 

Hi Hagop

 

I trust that you are well.

 

Thank-you and your team for taking the time to speak with me yesterday.

 

As discussed kindly send the following detail so that we may progress the Business Interruption claims:

 

*	Daily sales figures for the outlets in April 2023 and April 2024
*	Monthly sales figures from April 2022 to date.
*	Monthly P & L / management accounts for the outlets from April 203 to end March 2024

 

Also kindly clarify the monthly revenue for the catering division from April 2023 so that we may examine this.

 

Please note that no information within this communication is intended to imply acceptance of Liability and all communication is issued on an entirely without prejudice basis and any sums calculated in relation to this claim will be in accordance with the Terms and Conditions of the Policy of Insurance and all decisions with regards the extent of policy response rest strictly with your Insurers and their risk partners.

 

Sincerest regards



Carl Roberts | Regional Manager – United Arab Emirates and Sultanate of Oman

Sedgwick Middle East Limited
P.O. Box 3454, Dubai, UAE
